data.title: List of zombie video games
data.meta_description: This is a list of video games with zombies. Most games with undead are survival horror or action adventure. These games feature creatures inspired by the archetypal flesh-eating zombies seen in horror films, B-movies and literature, such as in the films of George A. Romero. Particular zombie...
data.text:
Name Year Platform Description Alone in the Dark (series) 1992-present Various Survival horror series featuring zombies and other undead creatures Beast Busters 1989 Arcade Gun-game in which the players have to shoot their way out of a zombie-infested city. CarnEvil 1998 Arcade Game about an undead amusement park given the title, "The Greatest Show Unearthed!" City of the Dead Canceled Cancelled X Combat Arms (Quarantine Mode) 2008 PC Try to survive 2:00 Minutes and Infect/Kill other humans to win or lose. Corpse Killer 1994 PC, Sega CD, Sega CD 32X, 3DO, Sega Saturn Video game which featured a gang of hunters/soldiers who flee from a village full of zombies. D2 2000 Sega Dreamcast Game (originally for the never released Panasonic M2) played from a 3rd/1st person perspective with a light RPG element. Dead Head Fred 2007 PlayStation Portable Game revolves around Fred's missing head while progressing through the game the player can collect an assortment of different heads which all have different abilities. Dead Island 2008 PC, Xbox 360 A game about a diverse group of survivors that struggle to survive a zombie apocalypse on a vacation resort where firearms are a rarity and sticking together is key to survival. Players are able to craft and find unique weapons to use against their undead adversaries. Dead Rising Series 2006- present Xbox 360,PC,PS3 A game where the player, an everyday photographer, is looking for the scoop of the century. He instead ends up stuck inside a mall filled with zombies. The player is able to use incredibally useful weapons like a chainsaw to less useful but comedic weapons, like a toy Lightsaber. Players are also able to make insane combo weapons like a spiked bat or a drill bucket. Dead Space 2008 PC, PS3, Xbox 360 Player is a systems engineer and is trapped on mining ship with mutated undead humans influenced by a religious artifact found on the planet below. Doom Series 1993-present PC, Xbox, Xbox360 - The player combats gun-wielding, zombies and other monsters on the moons of Mars, Mars itself, and Earth. Evil Dead Series 2000-2005 Various These games(Evil Dead:Hail To The King,Fistful Of Boomstick,Regeneration) feature Ash from the Evil Dead movies slicing and dicing up zombies (Deadites) with his attached-at-the-arm chainsaw, plus various other aquired weapons such as his double-barrel shotgun, a.k.a. his Boomstick. Flesh Feast 3D 1998 Sega Zombie Hunting PC Game House of the Dead Series 1996 Arcade, PC, Xbox, Nintendo Wii Hunter: The Reckoning Series 2002 Xbox, Gamecube Infected 2005 PlayStation Portable Players assume the role of a New York cop and must rescue civilians from the undead, shoot-em-up. Killing Floor 2005-present PC A survival multiplayer game mod (modification)/total conversion of the Unreal Engine. Players assume the role of a squad team that stop increasingly powerful waves of specimens, which are actually laboratory failures and not Undead. These specimens are failed clones that started spreading in England, UK. A corporation named Horzine experimented in an underground biolab but a critical failure triggered the spawning of masses of laboratory horrors. Land of the Dead: Road to Fiddler's Green 2005 PC, Xbox The only Romero-based game ever released, with a parallel story to the movie of the same name. [1] Left4Dead 2008-present PC, Xbox 360 A multiplayer, Zombie based survival game by Turtle Rock and Valve Little Red Riding Hood's Zombie BBQ 2008 Nintendo DS Necrotic Drift 2004 PC Necrotic Drift is a survival horror text adventure that follows the story of gaming store employee Jarret Duffy when all hell breaks loose in his mall, developed by Robb Sherwin The Oneechanbara Series 2000 PlayStation 2 Hack and slash games involving the female protagonist cutting swathes through an army of undead in modern day Japan. Resident Evil Series 1996-present Various Features flesh-eating zombies created by synthetic means, i.e. mutagenic viruses created by the evil Umbrella Corporation. However, Resident Evil 4 features a parasitic type of zombie and some other monsters rather than virus created zombies. Possession 2010 Playstation 3, Xbox 360 Game where you are a zombie looking to exact revenge on the humans who made you undead. Possibly canceled. "Rebel_Without_a_Pulse" "Stubbs the Zombie in "Rebel Without a Pulse" 2005 Mac OS X, PC, Xbox, Xbox 360 A third-person game played as the zombie, along with an army of converted zombies. Survival Crisis Z 2004 PC Computer role-playing game (CRPG) Teenage Zombies: Invasion of the Alien Brain Thingys 2008 Nintendo DS Touch the Dead 2007 Nintendo DS On-rail, first-person shooter that challenges a player to eradicate hundreds of waves of zombies in prisons, swamps, and military bases. Typing of the Dead 1999 PC, Sega Dreamcast A spin-off/port of House of the Dead that tries to serve as a typing trainer. Urban Dead 2005-present Web A browser-based MMORPG where players can join either the survivors or the zombies, in the battle for control of a quarantined city. The Witcher 2007 PC World War Z 2013 App A story called World War Z. A hero name Doug Perry can rescue the victims in the middle of chaos. Doug can survive the z's in Denver Kyoto and Paris. Doug can save Yvette Rob and Emil in the city. This is just beggining Zombi 1990 C64, ZX Spectrum, Amstrad CPC, Commodore Plus/4, Amiga, Atari ST Like Dead Rising, Zombi has a zombies-in-shopping-mall theme inspired by the film Dawn of the Dead. Zombie Apocalypse 2009 Xbox Live Arcade, Playstation Network Downloadable shoot'em up created by Nihilistic Software and published by Konami Zombies Ate My Neighbors 1993 SNES

Sega Genesis

A humorous game including parodies of many classic B-movie monsters. Zombie Massacre 2010 Wii Light Gun arcade game. Zombie Panic! Source 2005 PC A multiplayer Half-Life 2 mod, in which players are divided into two teams, survivors and zombies. When survivors are killed, they become zombies. Zombie Panic! is a mod for Half-Life by the same developers. Zombie Plague 2007 PC A Counter-Strike modification where humans must to kill the zombies to defeat the infection. If the zombies kills the last human, they will take over the world.
